SELECT i.id, i.created_at createdAt, i.status, i.coupon_id couponId, i.member_id memberId, i.payment_id paymentId ,c.name, c.discount_type discountType, c.discount_value discountValue, c.end_at endAt FROM COUPON_ISSUE i JOIN COUPON c ON c.id = i.coupon_id WHERE i.member_id = #{memberId} AND i.status = 'DEFAULT'

SELECT i.id couponIssueId, c.id couponId, i.member_id memberId, c.name name, c.discount_type discountType, c.discount_value discountValue, i.created_at createdAt, c.end_at endAt FROM COUPON_ISSUE i INNER JOIN COUPON c ON (i.coupon_id = c.id) WHERE i.status = 'DEFAULT' AND i.id = #{couponIssueId}
